page.title: 18WEST COKER AREA TRADE
page.content: THE THREE VILLAGES EACH HAVE A POST OFFICE/GENERAL STORE. THE POST OFFICES ARE OPEN MON TO SAT 9.OO TO 5.30. THEY HAVE A MIXED GROUP OF CUSTOMERS BUT POSSIBLY MAINLY OLDER PEOPLE.THURSDAY IS THEIR BUSIEST DAY BECAUSE THIS IS PENSION DAY AND MANY OLD PEOPLE COLLECT THEIR PENSIONS AND DO SOME SHOPPING.ALLTHE POST OFFICES SPECIALISE IN SELLING CARDS, STATIONARY, TOYS & FANCY GOODS. TWO OR THREE PEOPLE WORK IN THE SHOPS. THE POST OFFICES IN EAST CHINNOCK AND COKER GET A LOT OF PASSING TRADE ON "A 30" BUT HARDINGTON HAS LITTLE TRADE EXCEPT FROM THE VILLAGE.
